original_title: Gallows Humour: Inside 'The Horror of Frankenstein'
overview: A series of interviews between film historians Jonathan Rigby, Kevin Lyons, John J. Johnston and several others that tracks the events which led to the making of the film The Horror of Frankenstein and the state of the Hammer studio at the time.
title: Gallows Humour: Inside 'The Horror of Frankenstein'
